General¶

Assorted utility functions.

Link Commands¶

Each of the following commands returns a link related to the bot and its usage.

/docs returns a link to this very documentation! /github returns a link to the bot’s github repository, where the source code is available. /invite returns an invite link, to add the bot to a server you have control over. /server_link returns a link to the bot’s Discord server, where you can ask for help if needed.

ping¶

/ping calculates the bot’s ping time.

poke¶

/poke just pokes the bot to see if it’s online. If response time is important, use ping.
